title: Microsoft Corp. stock outperforms competitors despite losses on the day
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       sank 0.31% to $402.79 Tuesday, on what proved to be an all-around grim trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.60% to 4,975.51 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.17% to 38,563.80. This was the stock's third consecutive day of losses. Microsoft Corp. closed $18.03 short of its 52-week high ($420.82), which the company achieved on February 9th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Tuesday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       fell 0.41% to $181.56, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       rose 0.31% to $142.20, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       rose 0.43% to $141.12. Trading volume (24.0 M) remained 866,097 below its 50-day average volume of 24.9 M.
